tool.name: ConsolidateShapefiles

param.name: inWorkspace
param.dialogReference: This input folder and it's subfolders will be searched.

tool.summary:
This tool;

  1. Searches for shapefiles within a given folder (and it's subfolders) that match the file filter.

  2. Creates a feature class in an output geodatabase with the schema of the first shapefile found

  3. Appends all the other shapefiles into that feature class.

The tool does not perform any transformation or schema mapping between the shapefiles. It's simply finds the files and appends them.
